text: @JaniceDean @NYGovCuomo I am so sorry for your loss Janice and I feel Governor Cuomo has to be held accountable for the lives lost in the Nursing Homes in The State of New York that were affected by HIS decision to send Covid-19 Patients to those Nursing Homes!!  He is Responsible!!!
